KSSSCI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Field Officer Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 12:47 IST
 Indian Council of Medical Research
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  Uttar Pradesh |  Salary : 30,000 to 30,000




FOLLOW

The Kalyan Singh Super Speciality Cancer Institute (KSSSCI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Field Officer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, B. Pharm, Pharm.D can apply for the KSSSCI Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Uttar Pradesh.

KSSSCI Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Field Officer	01	Any Degree, B. Pharm, Pharm D

KSSSCI Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 35 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

KSSSCI Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

KSSSCI Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

KSSSCI Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 30,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the KSSSCI Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the KSSSCI Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned e-mail address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

E-mail Address:

hta.ksssci@gmail.com.

Important Dates:

Starting date	16-08-2025
Closing date	23-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
